short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily identify the color on the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the feature-rich Color Picker extension, which detects any color with a single click. So, you just need to click on the color you want, and you'll get its code. It's as simple as possible. The color palette can be in different formats. The color palette is absolutely free and, most importantly, very versatile. We've done our best to make sure that you won't have any problems when using the color palette. Download our product now.
